About Me

Hello, I am a developer with experience on various projects related to NLP, ML, XR and other projects. I am completing my M.Sc. Computer Engineering program at University of Duisburg Essen. Experience with NLP, Machine Learning, Data Science, VR and AR development and Game development.

Experience

University of Duisburg-Essen

Work Student - Information's SystemNovember 2019 - September 2020

Data collection, analysis and Front End Development

  • Scraping information from news sources
  • Data organization of tweets and scraped information
  • Web Application Testing and Development
Python Tweepy Scrapy BeautifulSoup MongoDB

Numena GmbH

Intern - XR Developer January 2019 - June 2019

VR and AR development with C# programming using various SDKs related to ViveVR, OculusVR and other devices

  • Wikitude, Vuforia AR Application development for Medical Companies
  • HTC Vive, Oculus GO and other VR projects development with C# Programming
  • Deploying projects to Google Playstore, Apple Appstore and Steam Store
C# Unity OpenVR Wikitude Android and Apple AR Development Steam

Barmenia Versicherungen

Intern - Machine Learning October 2018 - December 2018

Classification of Dental Insurance Records with deep learning models

  • Large Scale Data Preprocessing
  • Deep Learning Architecture with Feed Forward, RNN and BiLSTM networks.
  • Accuracy of 96.7% with F1-Score of 91%
Python Machine Learning Deep Learning Tensorflow Keras

Projects

Twitter User Credibility

Verifying the credibility of twitter users with Machine Learning. A Master Thesis project developed with experience on Python, Tweepy, MongoDB

Game Architecture And Design

A Unity Game Development Project, where the player shifts shapes for different powers to explore the levels

Information Scraper

Scraping Tweets regarding False News and Misinformation. Experience with Python, Scrappy, Tweepy, BeautifulSoup and MongoDB. - Project on Github

Image Clusterer

An application developed with deep Learning with focus on Images, Clustering random images in your hardware to different folder groups for easier access. Done with Python, Keras, and VGG19

Discord Bot

An NLP program that reads for user sentiments of discord users.

Argument Mining

A Classical ML project to find relation between a claim and argument sentence.
